articles.title: OnePlus now giving lifetime warranty on phones - India Today
articles.description: OnePlus India has announced that it will give lifetime warranty for its phones that have been affected by green screen issue.
articles.content: The devices like OnePlus 8 Pro, OnePlus 8T, OnePlus 9, and OnePlus 9R, won't be covered because there are no "spare parts" to fix the issue.
